archimate:Requirement.name: CP-7(6): Alternate Processing Site | Inability to Return to Primary Site
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Plan and prepare for circumstances that preclude returning to the primary processing site.

properties.value: There may be situations that preclude an organization from returning to the primary processing site such as if a natural disaster (e.g., flood or a hurricane) damaged or destroyed a facility and it was determined that rebuilding in the same location was not prudent.
